messages.title: Choose to protect our fragile economy
messages.content: Our economy is beginning to grow again, but it needs continued support.

messages.title: Vote for the many, not the few
messages.content: I'm proud of the action we've taken so far and I'm proud of our plans for the future.

messages.title: Choose to protect public services
messages.content: Labour will continue to protect frontline services. In the NHS we'll create a legal right to tests for cancer within two weeks maximum.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Support the fragile growing economy and oppose Tory plans for deep cuts.
Create a legal right to tests for cancer within two weeks and guarantee for cancer referrals.
Oppose Tory inheritance tax giveaways to the wealthiest.

mentions.tacticalSituation: It is a close two horse race between Labour and the Tories.

issues.economy: The General Election will be a clear choice between a Labour Government committed to a fair future for all, or a Tory change that puts the economic recovery at risk.
issues.health: Our plans for the future will continue to support families by... giving their children the best possible start in life.
issues.socialWelfare: Support families by making work pay and giving their children the best possible start in life.

leaflet.personalStatement: Dear Ms Lilly Johnson, On May 6th you have an important decision to make. The General Election will be a clear choice...

politicalExperience.role: Your Labour Candidate for South Ribble
